WorkItem.ClosedComment: Astrylian fixed, cancelling working as expected in the latest Rawr3 code.
WorkItem.Description: I know that armory is known to be broken, but I wanted to try it anyway to see what happened.  When I tried to cancel out of the dialog or press the X to close it, nothing happened.  I'm still stuck with the open dialog, and had to refresh to play with rawr again.
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Load from Armory can't be cancelled

Comments.Message: Something with Blizz not letting apps draw from Armory or similar. Don't know the details, but it or something like it is restricting me from enjoying the open beta, apparently. See Astrylian's post in Discussions.

I'm aware of the problems with querying the armory.  This issue is more that it doesn't cancel gracefully, which should be doable regardless of if a connection can be made with the armory or not.

Maybe the issue will be fixed when we can connect to the armory; I'm not sure.  Regardless, from a "bug tracking" position, this is a different issue :)

er... ok, I just downloaded the R3 benefactor's version, tried to load from armory - no go
tried to figure out the character profiler (never messed with before) - not implemented
tried to use a saved .xml file from my Mono attempts a few days ago - no go

ouch. will this version be able to connect to the armory? Or are we still waiting on Blizz?

right now I seem to be stuck not using Rawr 3
If you wish to play with Rawr3, I have found it easy to load the character in Rawr2, save the character, then open the save file in Rawr3.  Works with no probs at all.
